answers.answer: Just look at the bright side y'all's kids will grow up being best friends :)
And on the other bright side - she's at much higher risk of complications due to the gestational diabetes and the early induction. If you've been cleared to go to full term that's a great sign!

Try lots and lots of walking and having sex. If you're already 39 weeks you can definitely have your baby at any moment and there's nothing wrong with jump starting it at this point. Maybe you'll even go into labor the same day as your friend or right before she goes for her induction.! Lol. You never know. Good luck. :)

Lol yea im excited for her she gets induced the day b4 my due date and i want nothing but the best for her and for her to have a healthy baby boy,i was stuck at 1cm for the last 2 weeks i go friday i hope things have progressed :),and trust me i walk i don't have a car and i have to take the train to work and bus anywhere else lol i rarely sit at wrk either i walk soo much nd have since the beginning nd now i can hardly wlk it's too much pain in my vj where i have.to stop for a few mins. And I've been having sex but no luck yet either lol
My due date is the 23rd and its most likely your friend is being induced cuz the diabetes

Yea i figured which is understandable im not really jealous jus wish my lil girl will stop being stubborn lol he daddy nd his bro nd sis all stayed in his mom longer than her due date they jus wanted to stay in there lol
I had diabetes prior to getting pregnant I'm 32 weeks and my doctor said it was more likely that id be induced as well. If we carry to full term we have a higher risk of a still born
Oo wow glad they decided to do it now,as long as their both ok and healthy that's all i care bout

question: My best friend is pregnant too but her due date is jan26th and mine is next week jan22nd bit she has gestational diabetes i don't and today she finds out she's getting induced Tuesday....i think it's bc of her diabetes don't get me wrong im very happy for her lol i jus wish my lil girl was here already and im 39weeks but i hope the best for my best friend
title: kinda jealous lol
